articles.title: Where is the best place to see the 2024 eclipse? 7 spots in New Hampshire - The Boston Globe
articles.description: The highly anticipated Great North American Solar Eclipse — which will send a lunar shadow sweeping across the US on April 8 — is expected to bring a wave of visitors to the Granite State.
articles.content:
Five weeks from now, for about three and a half minutes, the mid-afternoon sun over New Hampshires Great North Woods will be totally obscured by the moon.
The highly anticipated Great North American… [+3398 chars]
